name: Nouveau Sangaree
description: This spicy wine cocktail from Jim Meehan of PDT calls for Beaujolais Nouveau, but you can substitute any light-bodied red wine. Balance an apple slice on the edge of the glass as a garnish.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Beaujolais Nouveau or other red wine
1/4 ounce Deep Mountain Grade B Maple Syrup
Garnish: apple slice sprinkled with cinnamon or nutmeg

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add wine, apple brandy, sloe gin, maple syrup, and bitters. Stir well and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish and serve.
